tog-fancysig: Hu ɔdabaa dɛ wikitext (ber a ɔnye mo dwumadzinyi krataafa no nnya twaka amonmu)
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Ma me Email ber a krataafa anaa fael bi a ɔwɔ dza m'enyi wɔ ho bea hɔ no  asesa.
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Ma me imeel ber a mo nkɔmbɔdzibea krataafa no asesa
tog-enotifminoredits: Ma me imeel so wɔ nkrataafa na fael ho nsesa kumaa ho
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Da me imeel adrɛɛse edzi wɔ nkrato imeel ahorow mu
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Ma ɔfa yi mu nsesa kwan ber a irimia right click wɔ ɔfa no tsirasɛm no do.
tog-editondblclick: Yɛ nkrataafa no mu nsesa ber a emia do mprɛnu
tog-minordefault: Yɛ nsesa nyinara nkumaa wɔ berkan mu
tog-previewonfirst: Da ahwɛkan edzi ber a nsesa rehyɛ ase
tog-previewontop: Da ahwɛkan edzi ansaana nsesamu pon aba
tog-usenewrc: Fa krataafa a ɔwɔ nsesa a ɔnnkyɛree na dza w'enyi wɔ ho mu kyekyɛ nsesa ahorow a wɔayɛ mu.
tog-hideminor: Suma nsesa kumaa fi nsesa a ɔnnkyɛree no mu
tog-hidepatrolled: Suma nsesa a wɔahwɛ mu no fi nsesa a ɔnnkyɛree no mu
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Suma nkrataafa a wɔahwɛ mu fi kratafa fofor ndzidzidodze no mu
tog-shownumberswatching: Da dwumadzifo a hɔn enyi wɔ ho no hɔn dodow edzi
tog-extendwatchlist: Tserɛw dza w'enyi wɔ ho no mu ma ɔnda nsesa nyinara edzi, na nnyɛ enyimenyim yi ara dze nko
tog-watchdefault: Fa nkrataafa na fael a meyɛ mu nsesa no ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho no ho
tog-watchmoves: Fa nkrataafa na fael a mebɛsesa ne bea no ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho bea no ho
tog-watchdeletion: Fa nkrataafa na fael a mebɛpepa no ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho bea no ho
tog-watchcreations: Fa nkrataafa meyɛ na fael a medze ba no ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho no ho
tog-watchuploads: Fa fael afofor a medze ba no ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho bea no ho
tog-watchrollback: Fa nkrataafa a matwe asan ka dza m'enyi wɔ ho bea no ho
